channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Pennies will be going away soon. Here's why and what to do with yours
Eurosceptic nationalist Karol Nawrocki elected Poland president in tight election
Florida man faces 20 years in prison for scamming customers out of $1.3M, leaving them with unfinished pools
Trump tariffs deals major blow to European steelmakers, Salzgitter CEO warns
Don't let the May rally fool you. There's more volatility ahead.
Fire kills 12 people reportedly locked inside drug rehab center
item.description: Officials believe cartels sometimes execute rival drug dealers as well as patients who refuse to join their ranks.

item.title: GOP-friendly group putting millions into boosting support for Trump tax agenda
item.description: The House passed President Trump's "one, big, beautiful bill," which includes continuing the 2017 tax cuts, but several GOP senators have voiced conce...

item.title: Boulder attack updates: Suspect booked on charges after 'act of terror'
item.description: Police in Colorado are responding to a "heinous" attack at a pedestrian mall in the city that they say left several victims.

item.title: Trump-backed conservative narrowly wins Poland's presidential election
item.description: Conservative Karol Nawrocki narrowly won Poland's presidential runoff election, beating Warsaw's liberal mayor, according to the final vote count. Naw...

item.title: Lion kills man at luxury safari lodge after he left tent to use toilet
item.description: The victim was camping with other tourists at the tented resort when the early morning tragedy unfolded, police said.

item.title: WATCH: Wildfires in Canada trigger air quality alerts across the Midwest
item.description: Canada declared a state of emergency due to the wildfires, forcing thousands to evacuate their homes.

item.title: What we know about the suspect and victims in the Boulder, Colorado, attack
Britain getting a defense boost aimed at sending a message to Moscow, and to Trump
item.description: The U.K. will build new nuclear-powered attack submarines and create an army ready to fight a war in Europe as part of a boost to military spending

item.title: Istanbul peace talks resume as Russia reels from surprise Ukraine drone attack
item.description: Ukrainian and Russian delegations are set to meet again in Istanbul, Turkey, on Monday to take part in the next round of U.S.-brokered peace talks.

item.title: WorldPride is in D.C. this year, prompting fears for some LGBTQ people

item.title: WFP's Cindy McCain: Gaza could be 'a humanitarian catastrophe ... like none other’
item.description: On “This Week,” World Food Programme's Cindy McCain discusses efforts to distribute aid in Gaza.

item.title: Thousands evacuated in 3 provinces as Canadian wildfires threaten air quality into some US states
FBI says 8 injured in Colorado attack by man with makeshift flamethrower who yelled ‘Free Palestine’
